cu.explanation_en: Setting the physical layer log level to an invalid enum like 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and may prevent proper physical layer logging.

du.explanation_en: Setting the zero correlation zone config to -1 is out of the valid range and may cause RACH configuration failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將零相關區配置設定為 -1 超出有效範圍，可能導致 RACH 配置失敗。
